Democracy breeds corruption, and a republic is corruption already bred. A #République stamps out both. 

http://t.co/E0HZhrOaMN

"Nothing better can be found than the rule of an individual man of the best kind."

 ~ Darius the Great (550–487 BCE)
"[It] is impossible that corruption should not arise, and there arise among the corrupt men not enmities but strong ties of friendship."
What is best for one, for two, for all of us? Darius the Great spoke in terms that argue for our need for a #République, not a democracy.
Debate over governance has spanned generations. History's most powerful minds have answered the call of its division bell. #République
The internet is anonymous as time, folding itself into itself. Learn to halt our culture's collapse in #République: http://t.co/lkut3C4UUm.
Treglazov is Herodotus' brother in a different era. #République bears the same yoke. It saves future and past glories from digital dementia.
Herodotus, father of history as a way of thought, labored so that no human glory of any kind may be lost. http://t.co/17pMwfiPp8
Gather your bearings in a shifting world of decentralized networks with Treglazov's landmark title #République: http://t.co/lkut3C4UUm.
A just government requires no illusion to secure the people's benefit. Bonus non mendacium! A #république does not deceive with pretty lies.
The people's imagined strength over bad government, the election, grants only the illusion of public influence on policy. #république
The true outcome of democracy is a waste: a populace made worse for getting what it wants. Seek what works best. Seek the #république.
Americans are enthralled that they live in a democratic republic only because they hear the adjective before the noun. #république
If we leave the republican corpus to its desires, we shall return to find the republic's corpse. We need our #république and our Overseer.
We cannot trust the republic body with its fetish, its illusion, of political and industrial competition as a source for the common good.
Can we trust culture to such freewheeling dispersal of ideas? Our flagship book Republique explores the risk at hand if we do.
A mere retweet brings these words into your thoughts, your conversation, your home. Do you marvel that you barely felt the invasion?
It will be a république crafted from human ingenuity.
It will not be a republic founded on traditional, inherited forms of organization.
By harnessing decentralized networks, we will make the nature of this government utterly unique.
...under the rubric of "cultural pluralism" and "freedom of speech." We shall not weep at your passing. The république does not need you.
Humankind stagnates in the morass of your egalitarian rhetoric and your evasion of responsibility...
Zealots of pop liberty, you may continue to play politics -- for now.
Wagtail is proud to announce its premiere publication offering: http://t.co/UqALcMmgRr
Behold the ghost in my république's machine.
